info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 15056
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 15056
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
deces.matchid.io.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=R8qdKQhQRtLbMF_bALIP-CGC16_BJCZSy8Olu7RTzY8"

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 3787
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 3787
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 NS

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
matchid.io.	1800	IN	SOA	tia.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2276361983 10000 2400 604800 3600
